blogPost.excerpt: Prize Card™ is a debit card that lets you win money and rewards instantly every time you use it. When you pay using Prize Card™ the merchant (i.e. the store) pays us a small transaction fee which we use to fund giveaways.
blogPost.body: Prize Card™ is a debit card that lets you win money and rewards instantly every time you use it. When you pay using Prize Card™ the merchant (i.e. the store) pays us a small transaction fee which we use to fund giveaways.
blogPost.title: Prize - Debit card with amazing rewards
blogPost.author: Hyacinthe Hamon

localize.description: Prize Card™是一种借记卡，让您每次使用时都能立即赢得金钱和奖励。当您使用Prize Card™付款时，商家（即商店）会向我们支付少量的交易费，我们将其用于资助赠品。
Prize Card™是一種借記卡，讓您每次使用時都能立即贏得金錢和獎勵。當您使用Prize Card™付款時，商家（即商店）會向我們支付少量的交易費，我們將其用於資助贈品。
